casebody.data:
Patricia CHEW, Individually and as Ad-ministratrix of the Estate of Daren Chew, deceased and William Chew, Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. Bent DIETRICH, Defendant-Appellee. No. 730, Docket 97-7476. United States Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Argued Oct. 20, 1997. Decided April 1, 1998. John A. Ciraldo, Perkins, Thompson, Hinckley & Keddy (David B. McConnell, on brief) Portland, ME, for Appellants. Cary R. Wiener, Kirlin, Campbell & Keat-ing (Brett M. Popolow, Richard H. Sommer, on brief), New York City, for Appellee. Before: WINTER, Chief Judge, MESKILL, Circuit Judge, and MARTIN* District Judge.

Hon. John S. Martin, Jr. of the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York, sitting by designation.

 [NO OPINION]
